title: churn blueberry and lemon ice cream
description: Homemade ice cream tastes great and is surprisingly easy. This version is lower in calories than most shop-bought ice cream.For this recipe you will need a food processor or blender. This meal provides 224 kcal, 14g protein, 42.1g carbohydrate (of which 42g sugars), 0.2g fat (of which 0g saturates), 5g fibre and 0.1g salt per portion.
ingredients: 500g/1lb 2oz frozen blueberries, plus extra for garnish
125g/4Â½oz icing sugar, plus extra to decorate
2 lemons, grated rind and 1 tbsp juice
